detail_desc: Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in linen with a resort collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short slits in the sides and a straight-cut hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Bikini top in sturdy fabric with triangular cups, wide multiway shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the back, laser-cut trims and visible seams.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently tailored jacket in a stretch dobby weave with narrow notch lapels, one button at the front, patch pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Straw hat with a fabric band around the brim. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a ribbed neckline and tie detail at the front of the hem.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 100x200 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit with a shawl collar and draped front. No fasteners.
Short dress in slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, frill-trimmed dolman sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.

Blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a pleated stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jeans in soft, patterned stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, and slim legs with narrow hems.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shorts in woven fabric. Regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs with creases.
Christmas stocking in soft velour with embroidery on the shaft and a hanger at the top. Size approx. 17x44 cm.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with embroidery. V-neck with narrow ties and a small frill trim, a gathered seam at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons and a small frill trim. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Satin underdress.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jeans in soft denim with a high paper bag waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, front pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a supersoft, brushed finish. Long raglan dolman sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie or tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Ankle boots with open sections at the sides, a loop at the back and adjustable straps with studs, concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft tulle with sequined embroidery at the top and on the skirt, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the back. Lined.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in textured-knit wool containing some cashmere with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar and French front. Short sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Bandeau bras in microfibre with elastication at the top, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Set with a T-shirt and dungarees in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder and slits in the sides. Dungarees with a print motif and appliqués, straps that fasten at the back, elastication at the back of the waist, and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless lace body with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a scalloped V-neck. Jersey lining over the bust, a V-shaped mesh insert at the waist and press-studs at the crotch.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim made partly from recycled cotton. Slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a zip at the top, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with reinforced toes, a padded edge and closed lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with a lined hood. Cable-knit front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Round-necked T-shirt in striped cotton jersey.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with decorative gathers at the top of the front and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.

Wide blouse in a cotton weave with inset lace trims, a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with pin-tucks front and back, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a frilled collar and buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with a seam and frill trim at the top and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.

Short, V-neck dress in an airy linen and viscose weave with a seam under the bust and elastication at the back. Buttons down the front and short sleeves with gathered elastication along the top for a puffy effect. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a shimmering print. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard at the top, and long raglan sleeves.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Practical travel case in grained imitation leather for storing jewellery. Four zipped inner compartments and seven straps with a press-stud. The case folds up and fastens with a concealed magnetic fastener. Size 16.5x21.5 cm.
Trousers in a lightweight Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide cotton jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Joggers in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly with buttons. Diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Mesh briefs with a lined gusset, narrow sides and high cut at the back.
Push-up bra in glittery jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a tie-front hem.
Geometric-shaped sunglasses with frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with a button at the back of the neck and an opening front and back. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Platform ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and block heels. Fabric linings and insoles and heavy, chunky soles. Platform front 5.5 cm, heel 12 cm.
